DOC.HEADLINE: KOCE DRIVE DRAWS RECORD REVENUES
DOC.TEXT: Orange County public television_station KOCE-TV Channel 50 completed its most successful membership drive ever on Sunday , raising $ 295 # 431 according to a preliminary estimate , station spokeswoman Judith Schaefer said Monday . The response to the 18-day campaign was attributed to special programming that included a taped concert by New-Age singer Yanni , as well as_to a one-day extension of the spring drive , Schaefer said . The drive brought_in almost 27 % more_than last spring ' s record-setting $ 232 # 803 during a 17-day campaign . ZAN DUBIN
